fields.question: What are SparkPoints?
fields.answer: SparkPoints are digital rewards within our app, giving users the opportunity to earn and redeem them for various benefits.

fields.question: How can I earn SparkPoints?
fields.answer: You can earn SparkPoints through sign-up, participating in contests, and winning contests.

fields.question: How do I redeem SparkPoints?
fields.answer: Accumulate enough SparkPoints, then redeem them for gift cards of your choice.

fields.question: How do I get my gift cards after redeeming SparkPoints?
fields.answer: Gift cards will be sent to your registered email/phone within 2 business days.

fields.question: What if I don't receive gift cards after redeeming SparkPoints?
fields.answer: Contact us through the support window after 2 days of redeeming for assistance.

fields.question: Why aren't participation points reflecting in my SparkPoints?
fields.answer: Participation points will be credited once the contest ends within 2 business days. If not credited, the post may be inappropriate or not genuine.
